Articles.Content: I heard that there was going to be a progress system in 0.21 but its not in it?
There is, you just can't access it. I don't know much about it though.
go to your save game and look in the persistent.sfs file and there will be a section in there tracking progress.
From what I understood, they were building the infrastructure for it. You can't interact with it yet, but the base of the code is there.
It is, but it's just covert. It does not have very much effect on the game now, but it reportedly does track major milestones in the game, they just mean nothing for the time being.

Just fyi they don't intend for there to ever be "achievement unlocked" pop ups in the game. The progress tracking is for Career Mode so that the game can determine what missions to offer you based on what you've demonstrated you can do.
